casebody.data:
Mohamed ALANI, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
GEICO INDEMNITY COMPANY, GEICO General Insurance Company, Progressive Michigan Insurance Company, and Progressive Marathon Insurance Company, Defendants,
and
Sentinel Insurance Company, Ltd., Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157368
COA: 334061 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the January 30, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered and, it appearing to this Court that the case of Dye v. Esurance Property & Casualty Ins. Co. (Docket No. 155784) is pending on appeal before this Court and that the decision in that case may resolve an issue raised in the present application for leave to appeal, we ORDER that the application be held in ABEYANCE pending the decision in that case.

BERNSTEIN , J., did not participate because he has a family member with an interest that could be affected by the proceeding.
